languages.text: "Синисториа. Последняя из суккуб культа Губительной жажды, заправлявшего ареной". {n}Слова Маражая обращены к вам, но он не сводит глаз со своих сородичей.{/n} "Именно она предложила мне вступить в кровавые прозелиты вместо того, чтобы украсить своими внутренностями ее покои".

traits.locale_text: "Последняя из суккуб культа, заправлявшего ареной". {n}Слова Маражая обращены к вам.{/n} "Точнее, того, что осталось от культа... твои сестры мертвы, тварь. Скоро ты к ним присоединишься".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."
languages.original_text: "Синисториа. Последняя из суккуб культа Губительной жажды, заправлявшего ареной". {n}Слова Маражая обращены к вам, но он не сводит глаз со своих сородичей.{/n} "Именно она предложила мне вступить в кровавые прозелиты вместо того, чтобы украсить своими внутренностями ее покои".

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the cult of the Gouged Eye that was running the arena." {n}Marazhai's words are addressed to you, but he is keeping a close watch on his kinsmen.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the cult of the Gouged Eye that was running the arena." {n}Marazhai's words are addressed to you, but he is keeping a close watch on his kinsmen.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sinisthoria. Der letzte Succubus des Kults des Fatalen Dursts, der über die Arena herrschte." {n}Marazhai antwortet, ohne den Blick von seiner Verwandten zu nehmen.{/n} "Sie hat vorgeschlagen, dass ich mich den Blutbefleckten Proselyten anschließe, anstatt ihre Kammern mit meinen Innereien zu dekorieren."
languages.original_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. Der letzte Succubus des Kults des Fatalen Dursts, der über die Arena herrschte." {n}Marazhai antwortet, ohne den Blick von seiner Verwandten zu nehmen.{/n} "Sie hat vorgeschlagen, dass ich mich den Blutbefleckten Proselyten anschließe, anstatt ihre Kammern mit meinen Innereien zu dekorieren."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “她是希斯索莉亚，来自统治竞技场的致命饥渴教派。她那个教派的最后一个血腥魔女。”{n}玛拉斋盯着他的族人。{/n}“就是她允许我加入了血腥叛党，没有用我的内脏装饰她的房间。”
languages.original_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."

traits.locale_text: “她是希斯索莉亚，来自统治竞技场的致命饥渴教派。她那个教派的最后一个血腥魔女。”{n}玛拉斋盯着他的族人。{/n}“就是她允许我加入了血腥叛党，没有用我的内脏装饰她的房间。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Sinisthoria. La dernière succube du Culte de la Soif Fatale à avoir dominé l'arène, {n}répond Marazhai sans quitter les siens des yeux.{/n} C'est elle qui m'avait conseillé de rejoindre les Prosélytes sanglants au lieu de garnir ses appartements avec mes entrailles. »
languages.original_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."

traits.locale_text: « Sinisthoria. La dernière succube du Culte de la Soif Fatale à avoir dominé l'arène, {n}répond Marazhai sans quitter les siens des yeux.{/n} C'est elle qui m'avait conseillé de rejoindre les Prosélytes Entachés de sang au lieu de garnir ses appartements avec mes entrailles. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Sinisthoria. La última súcubo del Culto de la Sed Letal que gobernaba la arena». {n}Marazhai responde sin apartar la vista de su congénere.{/n} «Fue ella la que sugirió que me uniera a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados en vez de usar mis vísceras como decoración en sus aposentos».
languages.original_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."

traits.locale_text: «Sinisthoria. La última súcubo del Culto de la Sed Letal que gobernaba la arena». {n}Marazhai responde sin apartar la vista de su congénere.{/n} «Fue ella la que sugirió que me uniera a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados en vez de usar mis vísceras como decoración en sus aposentos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「シニストリア。アリーナを統治していた『宿命の渇き』教団の最後のサキュバスだ」{n}マラズハイは同族から目を逸らさずに応える。{/n}「俺の内臓で彼女の部屋を飾る代わりに、『血まみれの改宗者』に加わるようにと提案したのは彼女だった」
languages.original_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."

traits.locale_text: 「シニストリア。アリーナを統治していた『宿命の渇き』教団の最後のサキュバスだ」{n}マラズハイは同族から目を逸らさずに応える。{/n}「俺の内臓で彼女の部屋を飾る代わりに、『血まみれの改宗者』に加わるようにと提案したのは彼女だった」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sinisthoria. Arenayı yöneten Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın son Sakkubus'u." {n}Marazhai, gözlerini soydaşından ayırmadan yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Odasını iç organlarımla süslemek yerine Kızıl Zındıklar'a katılmamı öneren oydu."
languages.original_text: "Sinisthoria. The last Succubus from the Cult of the Fatal Thirst that ruled the arena." {n}Marazhai responds without taking his eyes off his kin.{/n} "It was she who suggested I join the Bloodstained Proselytes instead of decorating her chambers with my innards."

traits.locale_text: "Sinisthoria. Arenayı yöneten Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın son Sakkubus'u." {n}Marazhai, gözlerini soydaşından ayırmadan yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Odasını iç organlarımla süslemek yerine Kızıl Zındıklar'a katılmamı öneren oydu."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
